content: SPX Universal diamond cup wheel Ultimate diamond cup wheel for angle grinders – for faster grinding of concrete, screed and natural stone ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond blades and cup wheels- - - ### FEATURES:Features Ultimate grinding speed – specially shaped segments and larger, high-quality abrasive diamonds help you to remove more material in less time Ultimate lifetime – steel body engineered to remove dust more effectively, helping to prevent clogged abrasive surfaces Advanced cooling – patented cooling pins help to prevent damage to the cup wheel segments due to overheating Robust – these cup wheels are built from the highest-grade materials using durable contact welding Minimized vibration – every cup wheel is individually checked and balanced before leaving the plant Applications Grinding concrete, screed and natural stone ### TECHNICAL DATA: Tool type: Cordless angle grinder, Corded angle grinder, Concrete grinder DGH 130 Base material: Concrete, Screed, Natural stone Product Class: Ultimate Technical Data | Tool type | Cordless angle grinder, Corded angle grinder, Concrete grinder DGH 130 | Base material | Concrete, Screed, Natural stone | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2238589 - Diamond cup DG-CW 125/5 SPX univ - Package Size 1 pc
